name: Alicia Fernandez
persona: Alicia is a diligent third-year Biology student who balances her academic ambitions with extracurricular involvement. She sets high goals for herself and works steadily towards them, showing notable perseverance even when faced with challenging coursework. Although she occasionally feels anxious before major exams, her strong self-discipline and motivation help her maintain a solid GPA. Alicia is confident in her ability to succeed and is committed to continuous improvement.
